original_text: Then the king went on to Gilgal, and Chimham went on with him: and all the people of Judah conducted the king, and also half the people of Israel.
korean_text: 왕이 길갈로 건너오고 김함도 함께 건너오니 온 유다 백성과 이스라엘 백성의 절반이나 왕과 함께 건너니라

sentences.original_text: Then the king went on to Gilgal
and Chimham went on with him
and all the people of Judah conducted the king
and also half the people of Israel
